channel.title: Electrocutioner (Neutral Killer)
channel.description:
DAY ABILITY 1:
NIGHT ABILITY 1: Charge: Apply a static charge to somebody. This person will die if they come into contact with another charged person or if they are charged a second time. This is silent.
NIGHT ABILITY 2: Electric Discharge: Should a charged player visit you, they will die. (Passive)
NIGHT ABILITY 3: Electric Field: Immune to death at night (Passive)
LORE: There is a rumor of a man whose immense power came from lightning itself. Believing this was a sign from above, he went on a mission to prove his godliness.
Idea sparked from http://www.blankmediagames.com/phpbb/viewtopic.php?f=27&t=23872&hilit=Electrician

item.title: Electrocutioner (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Dooku
item.description:
This is a good idea, but would it fit the theme of ToL? I don’t think there was electricity in Medieval times. But hey, I’m not sure if that matters.

Still nonetheless, good idea.

On an off-topic note to this subject, it’s a supervillain in Batman too!

http://batman.wikia.com/wiki/Electrocutioner

Read full topic

item.title: Electrocutioner (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Unoski
item.description:
Thanks for the feedback.

It only shuts down visits for the charged, which can be changed.
How would you buff it? Having undetectable deaths which die in pairs seem pair.

Read full topic

item.title: Electrocutioner (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Put some effort into making it unique?

In this case in particular I feel that it would be underpowered as-is, AND shutting down visits doesn’t seem to be in the spirit of ToL, where conversions exist.

Read full topic

item.title: Electrocutioner (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Unoski
item.description:
I never said it was original. I cited the source and everything.

What else am I to do when I find a ToS role that I would like to see on ToL?

Read full topic

item.title: Electrocutioner (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
No problem

I just feel that copy-pasting some popular ToS role ideas isn’t very original. Take that how you will.

Read full topic

item.title: Electrocutioner (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Unoski
item.description:
@deadfrien I forgot to include the ‘passive’ part of it.

@orangeandblack5 Thank you for your critique. You really contributed to the conversation.

Read full topic

item.title: Electrocutioner (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: deadfrien
item.description:
Electric Field and Discharge should probably be passive, and since you can only have 2 night abilities (mostly), Charge should probably be a day ability.
Or discharge can be a special passive and Charge could be the first night ability.
Anyways, you might want to nerf “Charge” to have a 1-day cooldown. It seems rather powerful.

Read full topic
